#summary The <name> Tag

= Introduction =

The `<name>` tag describes a name for this character sheet.


= Details =

Every Nerdcules character sheet must have exactly one `<name>` tag, which must appear inside the [TagHead <head>] tag. This tag is third in sequence, appearing after the [TagGame <game>] tag.

== Example ==

Please see the [TagHead <head>] tag for an example.
